backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister managing posts, comments, profiles, groups, notifications, and access control with helper functions for creating and retrieving notifications.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and dark mode styling definitions applied at the root and element levels.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry setting up authentication-aware layout and full routing tree for all pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/CollectionCommen: UI component for displaying and creating collection comments with user profile lookup, timestamp formatting, and error-handled submission.
frontend/src/components/CollectionPostCa: Displays a collection post with image, caption, likes, comments, and author info, and supports liking and toggling comment visibility.
Fetches and displays comments for a post and provides an authenticated form to submit new comments.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostCard.t: Provides a dialog-based UI for creating a new post with image upload, caption input, preview, and submission handling.
Shows a rotating daily prompt selected by day of year with themed styling and a static illustration.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionCommen: Displays discussion comments with timestamps and a submission form for authenticated users, including loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/DiscussionPostCa: Renders a discussion post with content, optional image, author info, like support, and an expandable comments section.
frontend/src/components/EditProfileModal: Modal form allowing users to edit and save their username and bio using a save profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/EventCommentsSec: Displays event comments, lets authenticated users post new comments, and formats timestamps and avatars.
frontend/src/components/EventPostCard.ts: Card showing event details, image, creator info, and a toggleable comments section.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GroupCommentsSec: Renders group comments, allows authenticated users to add comments, and includes timestamp and profile lookup.
frontend/src/components/GroupMembersDial: Dialog listing group members with profile info and admin-only member removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/GroupPostCard.ts: Card displaying a group post with author info, content, image, and expandable comments section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header handling auth state, user profile, unread notifications, and mobile/desktop menus.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with author info, image, likes, emoji reactions, comments, and interaction handlers.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCustomiza: Modal for choosing profile background and managing favorite tags with save callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Onboarding modal to create a username and bio, submitting the initial user profile.
frontend/src/constants/emojiReactions.ts: Defines the list of supported emoji reaction types and their IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout logic, and identity state management for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, notifications, admin checks, and various post types using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and custom color variables for light/dark themes, plus scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CollectionsPage.tsx: Renders the collections feed and a dialog for creating new collection posts with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays community groups with search, creation, and join actions, including adminâ€‘related UI behaviors.
frontend/src/pages/DiscussionsPage.tsx: Shows discussion threads by topic and provides a modal for creating new discussion posts with optional images.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Lists community events and renders skeletons when loading, using EventPostCard for each event.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Displays group details, posts, and membership actions, including creating posts with optional images and admin-level deletion.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeed.tsx: Renders the main community feed with hero section, daily prompt, post creation, and mood filtering.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Implements a mock marketplace with listing creation UI, image upload preview, and search, pending backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows user notifications grouped by type with actions to mark single or all notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and customizes the user's profile, shows posts and achievements, and provides editing and styling modals.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Renders a Resources page listing plushie care, storage, and display guides using cards and icons.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Converts backend error messages into short, user-friendly strings with specific cases and a fallback.
frontend/src/utils/imagePreprocess.ts: Resizes and compresses images client-side, returning optimized bytes and metadata before upload.
frontend/src/utils/imageUpload.ts: Validates, previews, preprocesses, and size-checks images before upload, exposing helpers for image handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and feature requests including image upload fixes and username resolution.
